definition: to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes

sentences.english: Zhang Bin walked over, sitting in the Maple" opposite, " uncomfortable?"
sentences.chinese: 張斌走過去，坐在了楓曉的對面，“難受？”

sentences.english: Zhang Bin has lots of thing to do every day, he never plays.
sentences.chinese: 張斌每天要做好多事，他從不玩。

sentences.english: Zhang Bin, he says he is tired.
I am a cold-blooded but I also sad ah, Zhang Bin felt helpless thinking.
sentences.chinese: 我冷血可是我也會難過啊，張斌心裏無奈的想着。

sentences.english: Zhang Bin, sometimes you could see straight, can also pierce to the heart of the matter.
sentences.chinese: 張斌，有時你看問題很準，也能一針見血。

sentences.english: Zhang Bin is an anchor for CCTV sports program.
sentences.chinese: 張斌是中央電視臺體育節目的主持人。

sentences.english: Feng Xiao shook his head, went to the edge of the table, Zhang Bin handed his chopsticks.
sentences.chinese: 楓曉搖了搖頭，走到桌邊，張斌遞給他筷子。

sentences.english: I can't say, at least not now. Zhang Bin : I believe in you?
sentences.chinese: 我不能說，起碼現在不能說。張斌你相信我嗎？
